name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Azure Machine Learning
description: This is a repository of azure machine learning APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Azure Machine Learning
apis.description: Azure Machine Learning lets you easily design, test, operationalize, and manage predictive analytics solutions in the cloud. Azure Machine Learning was designed for applied machine learning. Use best-in-class algorithms and a simple drag-and-drop interface—and go from idea to deployment in a matter of clicks. Try it free. If youre a developer who wants the data science built in, check out our APIs and Azure Marketplace.
